title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Imran Adams reveals Mitchell and Scott's as Cleo exits
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Hollyoaks fans have been watching Mitchell Deveraux’s struggles over his feelings for Scott Drinkwell (Ross Adams) and his alter ego Anita unfold and torment him over recent weeks and soon it will be a case of decision time. But actor Imran Adams has promised that the story is far from over – and he hasn’t seen any viewers with a correct theory yet.

At the moment, he remains in a relationship with Cleo McQueen (Nadine Mulkerrin) but he continues to be drawn back to Anita. Scott is confused about where Mitchell’s heart truly lies and, to be honest, so is he himself.

But it could be all about to end in tears as the storyline gathers pace.

Speaking to Metro.co.uk, Imran explained: ‘Mitchell has so many secrets in his family and his relationships with Cleo and Scott. 2020 is the year that the Deveraux family will get a bigger platform.

‘There are loads of conspiracy theories online but I haven’t seen anyone get it right. It’s going to be explosive. Mitchell’s character dynamic definitely changes for Christmas – and the village is going to change forever.

‘Expect the unexpected with Scott and Mitchell. It’s a beautiful story about love and acceptance. Bryan Kirkwood is a genius – I feel so honoured to be a part of it!’

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Of course, the pair have to survive the upcoming stunt disaster coming up. As the crane equipment topples, the oblivious couple share a kiss, as shown in the recent trailer.

But will it be a kiss of death as they finally give in to their feelings towards each other. And, with Nadine set to depart the show for her maternity leave, it looks like any chance of a happy ending for Cleo and Mitchell is dashed regardless.

Fans will have to wait and see if Mitchell discovers who he truly is – and embraces it.
